page.title: 15Transport around Sedlescombe
page.content:
There are two main roads in the area, running parallel to one another. The A21 is the main London to Hastings road with two roads leading from it to Battle. The other is the A229 which is the main Maidstone to Hastings road and joins the A21 just south of the village of Sedlescombe.
Public transport is minimal with infrequent bus services to Battle and Hastings.
The main London to Hastings railway line runs nearby, the nearest station being at Battle.
The Parish Council runs a private 'lift' scheme to help non-car owners get to work, shops, hospitals, etc. through the help of volunteer car-owners.
